title: How to Do It: I (Unfortunately) Know What My Husband Has Been Doing in Garage
description:
This week, Stoya and Rich answer a letter from a woman who’s worried about her husband’s secret habit, and offer suggestions for oral sex to a letter writer who has a unique problem. 

Mentioned in the episode:
Sex, God, and the Conservative Church by Tina Schermer Sellers
Is Porn Addiction a Real Thing?
Moody Bitches by Julie Holland
“TMJ and Intimacy” by S. Michael Plaut
